name: Reverse shot!
description:
You are an agent of a special unit that eliminates terrorist attacks, that your colleagues with a more standard set of capabilities have already failed to get in time to. You are moving back in time: your bullets are going into your weapon, not flying out of it.

In the prototype, you have to go through the scene of a serious terrorist attack in the subway, eliminate its culprits, and thereby erase it from history.
